name: Intrum
goal: Engage with relevant stakeholders and policy makers within financial services, financial regulations; e.g. credit management services, non-performing loans (NPLs), etc.
interests: Banking and financial services, Digital economy and society, Education and training
euInitiatives: Financial services, financial regulations and financial initiatives, within credit management services (e.g. late payments and payment times) and non-performing loans (NPLs).
